commandShortcuts.help: Sets your matchmaking status to Lurking
Sets your matchmaking status to Looking For Opponent
Sets your matchmaking status to Lurking
Sets your matchmaking status to Do Not Disturb

statuses.help: Actively seeking a match. This sends an announces to the channel.
statuses.alert:
<@Looking For Opponent> <@Lurking> 

{username} **is looking for an opponent!**

statuses.help: Not actively seeking a match, but available. Gets match seeking announcements, but does not announce to the channel.
Not seeking a match. Does not recieve match seeking announcements.
